greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of A302853: if A302853(k) = n, a(n) = k, or -1 if n does not occur in A302853.
comment: This is a left inverse of A302853, and also the right inverse if A282291 (and thus also A302853) is surjective (a permutation of natural numbers), in which case the fallback-clause is unnecessary.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..259
program: \\ For other needed code, follow A050376 and A282291:
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 17 2018
